alert.note: Alert for Mobile Inland; Monroe; Washington; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 25 at 3:58AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of Alabama, including the following areas, Choctaw, Clarke, Mobile Central, Mobile Coastal, Mobile Inland, Monroe, Washington and Wilcox and southeast Mississippi, including the following areas, George, Greene, Perry, Stone and Wayne. * WHEN...Through this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Multiple rounds of heavy rainfall are expected across the watch area through this afternoon. Additional rainfall amounts of up to 3 inches are expected, with locally higher amounts possible. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
